page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SUSAN
page.content: I get up at 8a.m. and have a breakfast of cereal and milk. I get ready for school then go down the road to wait for the car which takes me to Crosshill Primary School. I play with my friend Isabel until the bell rings at 9a.m. We change our shoes before going to the classroom where we do number and language work in the morning.Some days we have a television programme. At 10.30 we have playtime. We get free milk to drink and may buy crisps at tuck shop.Playtime ends at 10.45a.m. I have school dinners each day at 12.15 which consists of meat,potatoes and vegetable followed by a pudding .In winter we sometimes get soup first and no pudding.The afternoon starts at 1.45 and we do topic work until 3.30 when I go home.I change into play clothes and watch television before doing homework.
